parameters.jsCode: var raw = $input.first().json; var body = raw.body || raw; var data = body.data || body; var tenantId = String(body.tenantId || data.tenantId || ''); var UUID_RE = /^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$/i; if (!tenantId || !UUID_RE.test(tenantId)) throw new Error('Tenant ID requis'); function esc(v) { return v == null ? '' : String(v).replace(/'/g, "''"); } var query = "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_chantiers, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'planifie' THEN 1 END) as statut_planifie, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'en_preparation' THEN 1 END) as statut_en_preparation, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'en_cours' THEN 1 END) as statut_en_cours, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'suspendu' THEN 1 END) as statut_suspendu, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'termine' THEN 1 END) as statut_termine, COUNT(CASE WHEN statut = 'cloture' THEN 1 END) as statut_cloture, COALESCE(SUM(montant_marche), 0) as total_montant_marche, COALESCE(AVG(taux_avancement), 0) as avg_taux_avancement FROM btp_chantiers WHERE tenant_id = '" + esc(tenantId) + "'"; return [{json: {query}}];
var rows = $input.first().json; var dashboard = rows.length > 0 ? rows[0] : {}; return [{json: {success: true, data: dashboard}}];
